en: God had promised Abraham a son, but years passed without a child.
Sarai and Abram try to solve the problem in their own way. Yet God still sees and speaks.

lines: Now Sarai, Abram’s wife, had borne him no children.
But she had an Egyptian maidservant named Hagar.
“The Lord has kept me from having children.
perhaps I can build a family through her.”
Abram agreed to what Sarai said.
The angel of the Lord said to her:
and you will have a son.
“He will be the father of twelve rulers,

question.en: What do you notice about human plans and God’s continued care and promise in this story?
